headline: Why The Narrative Around Kroger Is Shifting After New Digital Partnership Updates
summary: Analysts have slightly trimmed their fair value estimate for Kroger to about $73.52 from roughly $74.36 as they recalibrate expectations around the company’s evolving digital ecosystem and key delivery partnerships. A modest uptick in the discount rate to around 7.90% from approximately 7.88%, along with a small lift in long term revenue growth projections to about 2.57% from roughly 2.53%, reflects a more nuanced balance between opportunity and risk tied to the expanded DoorDash...

headline: DoorDash (DASH) Outlook Tempered by Concerns Over Investment Costs and AI Disruption
summary: DoorDash Inc. (NASDAQ:DASH) is one of the best stocks to buy for the next 5 years. On December 11, Jefferies raised the firm’s price target on DoorDash to $270 from $260 with a Buy rating on the shares. Jefferies recommends a selective stance on Internet stocks for 2026. headline: DoorDash (DASH) Experiments With Standalone AI-powered App for Users to Locate New Restaurants, Reports Bloomberg
summary: DoorDash, Inc. (NASDAQ:DASH) is one of the Best Stocks to Invest in for the Next 3 Years. On December 16, Bloomberg reported that the company is experimenting with a standalone AI-powered app for users to locate new restaurants.
